Module SpiderCrisis
Package Main

Class Player

java.lang.Object
Main.Player
public class Player extends Object
Date: June 8, 2023

Version 2.0 of the Player class, a class that represents a player. More methods were added to the Player class, modifications by Lexi Han. Provided by JELTech Industries.

Course: ICS4UO with V. Krasteva

Version:
23.05.31
Author:
Lexi Han

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String n, int w, int h, int m)
      Constructor for Player class.
      Parameters:
      n - Name of player.
      w - Width of player.
      h - Height of player.
      m - The amount a player can move.

    • Player

      public Player()
      Default constructor for Player.

  • Method Details

    • addImage

      public void addImage(Image img)
      Method to add image to list of images. Precondition: img is not null.
      Parameters:
      img - Image to be added.

    • setX

      public void setX(int newX)
      Method to set new x-coordinates of player.
      Parameters:
      newX - new x-coordinates.

    • setY

      public void setY(int newY)
      Method to set new y-coordinates of player.
      Parameters:
      newY - new y-coordinates.

    • setLowerHitBox

      public void setLowerHitBox()
      Method to set lower hit-box of Player.

    • setLowerHitBox

      public void setLowerHitBox(Rectangle r)
      Method to set lower hit-box of Player.
      Parameters:
      r - Rectangle to set hit-box to.

    • setCoordinates

      public void setCoordinates(int x, int y)
      Method to set the coordinates of the Player's top left-most point.
      Parameters:
      x - The top-left most x-coordinate.
      y - The top-left most y-coordinate.

    • setHealth

      public void setHealth(int h)
      Method to set Player's health. Precondition: h is between 0 and 6, inclusive.
      Parameters:
      h - HP to set Player's health to.

    • moveHorizontally

      public void moveHorizontally(int amt)
      Method to move player's hit box horizontally (along x-axis).
      Parameters:
      amt - The amount of pixels to move them by. A positive quantity indicates rightwards movement, and a negative quantity indicates leftwards movement.

    • moveVertically

      public void moveVertically(int amt)
      Method to move player's hit box vertically (along y-axis).
      Parameters:
      amt - The amount of pixels to move them by. A positive quantity indicates downwards movement, and a negative quantity indicates upwards movement.

    • move

      public void move(int xDir, int yDir)
      Method to move the player in a certain direction.
      Parameters:
      xDir - The amount of pixels in the x-direction.
      yDir - The amount of pixels in the y-direction.

    • setDirection

      public void setDirection(int dir)
      Method to set direction player faces. Precondition: dir is between 0 and 3, inclusive.
      Parameters:
      dir - An integer from 0 to 3, representing the four directions: 0 is left, 1 is right, 2 is down, 3 is up.

    • loseHealth

      public void loseHealth()
      Method to lose Player's health by one hitpoint.

    • getX

      public int getX()
      Method to get player's X coordinate.
      Returns:
      Top left X-coordinate.

    • getY

      public int getY()
      Method to get player's Y coordinate.
      Returns:
      Top left Y-coordinate.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Method to get player's name.
      Returns:
      Name of player.

      public int getWidth()

    • getHeight

      public int getHeight()
      Method to return height of the player.
      Returns:
      Height of player.

    • getMoveDist

      public int getMoveDist()
      Method to return the distance a player can move each time a key is pressed.
      Returns:
      the amount the Player can move.

    • getHealth

      public int getHealth()
      Method to return the health of the Player.
      Returns:
      the health of the Player.

    • getHitBox

      public Rectangle getHitBox()
      Method to get hit box of player's full body.
      Returns:
      a Rectangle object, depicting the player's hitbox.

    • getLowerHitBox

      public Rectangle getLowerHitBox()
      Method to get hit box of a player's lower hit box (feet area).
      Returns:
      a Rectangle object, depicting a smaller version of the player's hit box.

    • getImage

      public Image getImage()
      Method to return the image to display of a player.
      Returns:
      the image to display.

    • getOrientedImage

      public Image getOrientedImage()
      Method to return the image of a player when they face a certain direction.
      Returns:
      Image of player facing their current direction.
